title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 147 - Performance Advances And Performance Awards For Managerial/confidential Employees
content:

State Regulations
§ 147.0 - Statement of policy
§ 147.1 - Coverage
§ 147.2 - Definitions
§ 147.3 - Performance evaluation
§ 147.4 - Performance advances
§ 147.5 - Performance awards, longevity performance awards and merit payments
§ 147.6 - Part-time employees
§ 147.7 - Performance advancement payments for trainees
§ 147.8 - Performance advance payments for certain superintendents of correctional facilities
§ 147.9 - Agency performance rating and payment reporting requirement
§ 147.10 - Waiving the rules and regulations
§ 147.11 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 147

Statutory authority: L. 1979, ch. 307, §§ 6[6], 14[6][c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
